description: Defines the MenuItemResult class and MenuItemStatus enum for representing and handling the processing results of menu items, including serialization and deserialization methods.

classes.name: MenuItemResult
classes.description: Represents the result of processing a single menu item (dish), with fields for id, name, image URL or base64, processing status, and error message, along with methods for JSON serialization and copying.

methods.name: copyWith
methods.description: Creates a copy of MenuItemResult with selectively overridden fields.

methods.name: toJson
methods.description: Converts the MenuItemResult instance to a JSON map for storage or transmission.

methods.name: fromJson
methods.description: Creates a MenuItemResult instance from a JSON map.

methods.name: toJsonString
methods.description: Encodes the MenuItemResult instance into a compact JSON string.

methods.name: fromJsonString
methods.description: Creates a MenuItemResult instance from a JSON string.

methods.name: statusToString
methods.description: Converts a MenuItemStatus enum value to its string representation.

methods.name: statusFromString
methods.description: Parses a string to get the corresponding MenuItemStatus enum value.
